name: EasyNotes
description: Note apps for Windows, Android and iOS with P2P sync / Приложения заметок для Windows, Android и iOS, с P2P синхронизацией
readme_summary: EasyNotes is a cross-platform note application that supports Windows, Android, and iOS. It offers P2P and web server synchronization, allowing users to keep their notes consistent across devices. The application supports multiple languages and includes features like a dark theme and tablet optimization.
key_features: Multi-language support (English, Russian, Chinese, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Japanese, Arabic, Italian, Korean, Turkish)
primary_use_case: Creating and synchronizing notes across multiple devices (Windows, Android, iOS) using P2P or web server synchronization.
cover_image_prompt: A multilingual scribe sitting at a large desk, illuminated by a soft glow, meticulously copying notes from various tablets (Android, iOS, Windows) onto a central, glowing ledger. Each tablet displays a different language (English, Russian, Chinese, etc.). The ledger shimmers with a subtle P2P network visualization, connecting it to each tablet. Small UI elements float around the scribe, showing language selection and sync status. The scene is set in a cozy, high-tech library with warm lighting. The image should be in a detailed digital painting style with clear outlines and vibrant colors.

name: curlsapp
readme_summary: Curls App is a privacy-focused iOS application for logging workouts. It features a comprehensive exercise database, custom exercise creation, workout history and analytics, and a template system for reusable routines. The app prioritizes user privacy by operating entirely offline, storing data locally, and avoiding analytics or account requirements.
key_features: Privacy-focused (100% Offline, Local Storage Only, No Analytics, No Accounts)
cover_image_prompt: A dedicated weightlifter meticulously logging their workout in a sleek, minimalist app on their phone. The app displays clear metrics and exercise history. Behind the weightlifter, a towering, glowing digital tree grows, its branches representing different exercises and its roots symbolizing the user's fitness data securely stored on the device. Small UI elements from the Curls App float around the tree like leaves. The scene is set in a modern, sunlit gym with a focus on privacy and simplicity. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with soft lighting and a clean, pastel color scheme.

name: LiYing
description: LiYing is an automated photo processing program designed for automating the post-processing workflow of ID photos in general photo studios. | LiYing 是一套适用于自动化 完成一般照相馆后期证件照处理流程的照片自动处理的程序。
readme_summary: LiYing is a Python program designed to automate the post-processing workflow for ID photos, typically used in photo studios. It features automatic human and face recognition, angle correction, background replacement, ID photo cropping to various sizes, and automatic photo layout. The program can be run offline, with all image processing done locally.
key_features: Automatic ID photo cropping to various sizes
primary_use_case: Automating ID photo post-processing for photo studios.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled artisan in a bright photo studio, meticulously crafting perfect ID photos. They use a magical tool that automatically trims, adjusts colors, and replaces backgrounds with a single click. Stacks of perfectly formatted ID photo sheets are neatly arranged, ready for printing. Subtle UI elements float in the air, showing the software's interface and real-time adjustments. The scene is bathed in soft, diffused light, creating a professional and efficient atmosphere. This should be a 3D isometric illustration with clean lines and vibrant colors, subtly incorporating the 'LiYing' logo.

name: blinko
description: An open-source, self-hosted personal AI note tool prioritizing privacy, built using TypeScript .
readme_summary: Blinko is an open-source, self-hosted personal AI note tool that prioritizes privacy. It allows users to quickly capture and organize their thoughts with AI-enhanced retrieval using RAG, ensuring efficient access to information while maintaining complete control over their data. Blinko supports Markdown and offers multi-platform support via Tauri.
key_features: Efficient and Fast note capture with Markdown support
primary_use_case: Quickly capturing and organizing fleeting thoughts and ideas in a private, self-hosted environment.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a diligent librarian in a cozy, sunlit study, surrounded by towering shelves filled with countless books (representing notes). The librarian, with a gentle smile, is using a glowing, futuristic monocle (AI) to instantly locate and retrieve specific passages from the books based on whispered queries from patrons. The retrieved passages magically appear as neatly organized digital notes on a nearby holographic display. Subtle UI elements float around the librarian, showing search queries and note previews. The repository name, 'Blinko,' is subtly etched on the librarian's desk. The scene is rendered in a warm, inviting 3D isometric illustration style with soft lighting and rich details.

name: mcp
description: A MCP server implementation for hyperbrowser
readme_summary: The Hyperbrowser MCP Server provides tools for scraping, crawling, and extracting structured data from web pages. It also offers access to general-purpose browser agents like OpenAI's CUA, Anthropic's Claude Computer Use, and Browser Use. The server supports profile management for persistent configurations.
key_features: Browser automation with Browser Use agent
Browser automation with OpenAI's CUA model
Browser automation with Anthropic's Claude Computer Use
primary_use_case: Providing tools to scrape, extract structured data, and crawl webpages, along with access to browser agents.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled cartographer meticulously charting a vast, ever-shifting digital landscape. The cartographer uses advanced tools to map out websites, extract valuable data points, and uncover hidden connections between pages. The landscape is filled with glowing nodes representing web pages, connected by shimmering threads of data. Small UI elements display structured JSON data and search results. The scene is set in a futuristic library filled with holographic displays. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and a vibrant color scheme.
